text:
This free new AI is to try vibe coding (from Google).

A step-by-step guide (click on "...more"):

1. Search for "Stitch by Google".
2. It's free & you can sign in with your Gmail.
3. Select the "Experimental mode" (top right).

Then you simply:
☑ Type your prompt (eg. "landing page for X").
☑ Select "mobile" or "web" for the format. 
☑ You can upload an image as a template.

For the last step, you:
1. Either copy the code of the design.
2. Or you extract it & copy it for your Figma.

Should I make a "vibe coding" guide for non-technical people who want to play with AI?

If yes, you would rather have me:
A. Design an entire landing page with AI.
B. Connect marketing AI agents to my database.
C. Create a workflow with AI to write content faster.

I wish I could create a poll on Linkedin...

So instead, I will extract all of your A, B & C comments and create the first guide on it.
